ADC_UI

Maintain ADC rules via an APEX frontend.  This package implements the methods required to maintain ADC rule groups via an APEX application.

Author:: Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

Functions
C_TRUE
function C_TRUE
return adc_util.flag_type

Method for determining truth values. Wrapper around ADC_UTIL.C_TRUE

C_FALSE
function C_FALSE
return adc_util.flag_type

Method for determining truth values. Wrapper around ADC_UTIL.C_FALSE

process_export_cgr
procedure process_export_cgr

Method to download one or many rule groups as a zip file

process_export_cat
procedure process_export_cat

Method to download action type definitions as a zip file

get_export_type
function get_export_type
return varchar2

Method to calculate the initial export state based on session state settings

Returns

One of the states ALL|APP|SGR

validate_edit_cat
function validate_edit_cat
return boolean

Method to validate page EDIT_CAT

Is called to validate user data if the page is submitted. (CAT = ADC Action Types).

process_edit_cat
procedure process_edit_cat

Method to process page EDIT_CAT

Is called to persist user data if the page is submitted. (CAT = ADC Action Types).

Method to validate page EDIT_CTG

process_edit_cpt

Method to process page EDIT_cpt

Is called to persist user data if the page is submitted. (cpt = ADC Action Parameter Value Type).

handle_cpv_changed
procedure handle_cpv_changed

Method is called if the user changes the Action Parameter Visual Type of a Action Parameter.

It checks whether the parameter requires a select list or a static list. If so, it shows and initializes these regions, otherwise it hides the regions.

validate_edit_cpt
function validate_edit_cpt
return boolean

Method to validate page EDIT_cpt

Is called to validate user data if the page is submitted. (cpt = ADC Action Parameter Value Type).

process_edit_ctg

Method to process page EDIT_CTG

Is called to persist user data if the page is submitted. (CTG = ADC Action Type Groups).

process_edit_cpt_static_list
procedure process_edit_cpt_static_list

Method to process page detail form R5_CPT_STATIC_LIST_FORM

Is called to persist user data if the page is submitted. (CTG = ADC Action Type Groups).

set_action_export_cgr
procedure set_action_export_cgr

Method to maintain APEX actions for page EXPORT_CGR.

Is called if relevant changes are reported to ADC.
